comment: Nice rye spice (95% rye!), very refreshing, smooth drinking. Nothing too complex or adventurous, but it’s pleasant. Pretty long finish. I’ll use it for cocktails, but could certainly sip it too.
Sweet, a little bit of spice on the back, smooth & easy drink.
Soft and smooth, both sweet then spicy. Overall very mild and pleasant to sip. Nothing exciting or adventurous.
